data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick Colorado.
Nima Saghafi awards Washington a goal kick.
Washington awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Washington in their own half.
Colorado have a dangerous throw-in.
Colorado's Kei Kamara misses with an attempt on goal.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Colorado are pushing forward but Andre Shinyashiki's finish is wide of the goal.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Washington.
Can Washington capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Colorado's half?
Colorado have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Washington.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Washington, D.C..
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Washington.
Ola Kamara (Washington) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Washington, D.C. Washington attack through Ola Kamara. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Colorado at Audi Field.
Joseph Mora is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Colorado push forward at Audi Field and Kei Kamara gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Washington defence.
Joseph Mora has recovered and rejoins the match in Washington, D.C..
Sam Nicholson of Colorado gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Washington's Junior Moreno is on target but unsuccessful.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.

Free kick Colorado.

Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Washington's half?
Nima Saghafi signals a Colorado throw-in in Washington's half.
Free kick for Washington in their own half.
Felipe Martins for Washington gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nima Saghafi awards Colorado a goal kick.
In Washington, D.C., Washington push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Washington.
Washington drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Washington's Felipe Martins gets in a shot on goal at Audi Field. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Throw-in for Washington in their own half.
Washington to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Washington.
In Washington, D.C., Edison Flores of Washington is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Colorado are coming forward and Sam Nicholson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Washington have a goal kick.
Washington surge into the attack at Audi Field but Russell Canouseâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Colorado at Audi Field.
Throw-in for Washington close to the penalty box.
Andre Shinyashiki of Colorado smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Colorado drives forward and Andre Shinyashiki gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Important block from the Washington defence as Keegan Rosenberry fires in a strike for Colorado.
Ball goes out of play for a Washington goal kick.
Nima Saghafi will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Julian Gressel is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Colorado's Keegan Rosenberry gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Washington defender.
In Washington, D.C., Drew Moor (Colorado) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Washington goal kick.
Nima Saghafi blows to end the first-half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Julian Gressel.
The second half has started at Audi Field.
Sam Nicholson (Colorado) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Colorado will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Washington.
Washington drive upfield and Julian Gressel gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Colorado defender.
Colorado's Kei Kamara gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Washington at Audi Field.
Colorado are coming forward and Younes Namli gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Washington have a goal kick.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Washington in their own half.
Free kick for Washington in their own half.
Colorado push forward at Audi Field and Sam Nicholson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Washington defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Washington in their own half.
Colorado are whistled for offside.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Washington.
Washington pushes forward through Steve Birnbaum, whose finish on goal is saved.
Andre Shinyashiki (Colorado) has received a first yellow card.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Washington in the half of Colorado.
Washington's Edison Flores gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Colorado defender.
Corner awarded to Washington.
Washington move into a 1-0 lead through a Russell Canouse header.
That's a fine assist from Julian Gressel.
Colorado's Kellyn Acosta is on target but unsuccessful.
Colorado pushes forward through [47], whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Junior Moreno for Washington has been booked by Nima Saghafi and receives a first yellow card.
Nicolas Mezquida is replacing Younes Namli for the away team.
Ball safe as Washington is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Washington drives forward and Ulises Segura gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Goal! Kei Kamara (Colorado) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Jack Price with an assist there.
Washington push upfield but Nima Saghafi quickly pulls them for offside.
Colorado have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.

Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
Washington make their first substitution with Yamil Asad replacing Edison Flores.
Free kick Washington.
In Washington, D.C. Washington drive forward through Russell Canouse. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nima Saghafi signals a Washington throw-in in Colorado's half.
Nima Saghafi awards Colorado a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Washington, D.C..
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Colorado close to the penalty box.
At Audi Field, Joseph Mora has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Drew Moor (Colorado) strikes at Audi Field but his header is cleared.
Nima Saghafi awards Colorado a goal kick.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Washington.
Washington to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
Robin Fraser is making the team's second substitution at Audi Field with Diego Rubio replacing Andre Shinyashiki.
Colorado are caught offside.
Washington needs to be cautious. Colorado have an attacking throw-in.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Washington in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
At Audi Field, Colorado are penalized for being offside.
The away team replace Sam Nicholson with Jonathan Lewis.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the away team.
Frederic Brillant (Washington) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Colorado's Kei Kamara breaks free at Audi Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Washington goal kick.
Kellyn Acosta for Colorado drives towards goal at Audi Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Colorado's Nicolas Mezquida breaks free at Audi Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Washington awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Washington.
Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Washington's half?
Jonathan Lewis puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
